column5: Saw that in the C.T flyer. It made me laugh then remember back about 7 years ago when we were looking into opening a juice bar and we were researching high power blaenders. This one must be at the top of the heap and it's cheaper then a Vitamix or a blentec! Just can't run that one indoors.
I saw that too, and the first thing i thought of was that new show Rocket City Rednecks!!! The guy is as redneck as they come, but he is also a Jet Propulsion Engineer
Any Top Gear fans in here? They did this too...but with a V8!
